metadata.title: CVE-2025-0238 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Assuming a controlled failed memory allocation, an attacker could havecaused a use-after-free, leading to a potentially exploitable crash. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 134, Firefox ESR < 128.6, and Firefox ESR <115.19.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
